pkgmetadata.longdescription: Experimental data and documented source code for the paper "A Map of Directional Genetic Interactions in a Metazoan Cell" // The package contains the experimental data and documented source code of the manuscript "Fischer et al., A Map of Directional Genetic Interactions in a Metazoan Cell, eLife, 2015, in Press.". The vignette code generates all figures in the paper.
